hero.personality: A Backend Developer, UI/UX, Editor Video

backend.title: Backend Developer
backend.excerpt: I am a fullstack developer who focuses on web application development using well-known frameworks such as React, Laravel, NextJs, etc.

design.title: UI / UX Design
design.excerpt: Create web and mobile application designs on User Interface (UI) and Use Experience (UX) using Figma and Adobe Illustrator software.

editing.title: Editing
editing.excerpt: Besides Website and UI/UX. I am proficient in video editing using Adobe Premiere Pro, Capcut, Alight Motion, Kinemaster, and VN software.

about.myStudy: I Study at the State Vocational High School 1 Bangsri
